game.title: COD Zombies Unblocked Survival Game
name: COD Zombies
cod-zombies
game.s_dis: COD Zombies is a wave-based survival game where players fight zombies, earn points, unlock weapons, and survive as long as possible.
game.l_dis:
COD Zombies ‚Äì Survive Waves of the Undead

COD Zombies challenges players to fend off endless waves of zombies, earn points, and strategically unlock weapons and perks to stay alive as long as possible.

What is COD Zombies?

COD Zombies is a co-operative survival mode within the Call of Duty franchise. Players fight zombies, repair defenses, and explore maps while advancing through an intricate storyline with Easter Eggs and hidden secrets.

How to Play COD Zombies?

  • Survive Waves: Defend against increasingly difficult zombie waves.
  • Earn Points: Kill zombies and repair barriers to gain points.
  • Buy Weapons: Purchase and upgrade weapons to improve your survival chances.
  • Perk-a-Colas: Acquire abilities like faster reload, increased speed, and extra health.
  • Pack-a-Punch: Upgrade weapons at the Pack-a-Punch machine for higher damage.

Why Play COD Zombies Unblocked?

COD Zombies Unblocked lets you experience the thrill of surviving waves of zombies anywhere, directly in your browser without restrictions.

Key Features

  • Wave-Based Survival: Endless hordes of zombies with increasing difficulty.
  • Weapon Upgrades: Earn points to unlock and enhance weapons.
  • Perks & Abilities: Purchase perks to improve your chances of survival.
  • Hidden Easter Eggs: Discover story elements, songs, and rewards.
  • Co-op Gameplay: Play with friends to survive longer and strategize together.

Zombie Survival Challenge üßü‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

Can you survive endless waves of zombies? COD Zombies tests your shooting accuracy, strategy, and teamwork. Every wave is more intense than the last!
